name: Virus Plague 2
description:
**Two modes: VIRUS and ANTIVIRUS**
**Real world: countries with different climates and world news**
**Advanced system of virus or antivirus development possibilities**

Virus Plague 2 - The Antidote is the new upgraded version of your favorite strategy game Virus Plague – Pandemic Madness! If in the first version your task is to eradicate all humanity via the deadliest virus, in the second you can play not only for the virus, but also for antivirus! You can either kill the humanity or save it – the future of the planet is in your hands!

HOW TO PLAY: Chose one of three levels: Easy, Normal or Hard, choose the territory and start to evolve your virus or antivirus. Remember that in poor countries viruses spread very quicky and it is more difficult to fight with them because of low level of medicine and hygiene.

Virus Plague 2 - The Antidote FEATURES:
- Two modes: VIRUS and ANTIVIRUS
- Real world: real countries with different climates, hot world news
- Three levels: Easy, Normal, Hard
- Advanced system of virus or antivirus development possibilities
